EntryPointPath.desc: Instead of using the EntryPointAttribute. Here can be written path to EntryPoint method without the EntryPointAttrbute

CustomNativeOut.desc: Copy output native file to the path. Base path is the project dir

AddictionalBuildArguments.desc: Adds an additional argument to the build command. Set null if you don't want to consider the argument
AddictionalBuildArguments.desc_: For best file size use: [InvariantGlobalization = true, StackTraceSupport = false, UseSystemResourceKeys = true, GenerateLogFile = false]

desc: Optimizing compiler by adding some libraries to ignore, it's worth adding here libraries-mappings that have a lot of non-user code. Example of name: "UnrealEngine.Mappings.dll"
